page.title: 13PEOPLE AND THEIR JOBS.
page.content:
could be improved.
I am a managing director and have been for 10yrs.I work 3 days a week and about 8hrs. a day.
I have been a teacher for 7yrs.previously I was a worker with Anglian Water.I spend 5 days a week at school and work about 7hrs. a day. I think I deserve more pay.
I am a librarian.I work a 5 day week of 37hrs.i think the pay is good and I enjoy having so many books available.Fewer hours a week would improve the job.
I am a mechanic working a 5 day 40hr. week.I have had this job 20yrs.the pay is good ,but the working facilities need improving.
